AND DATA_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{dataContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'

AND DATA_TYPE LIKE '%' || #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
AND DATA_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{dataContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR} || '%'
mapper.insert:

ID_ ,
MAIN_ID ,

DATA_CONTENT,

DATA_TYPE = #{dataType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATA_CONTENT = #{dataContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
